message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable asset. I believe it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to offer $950000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll make a counteroffer of $1050000, which is still $150000 more than your last offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1005000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a good price. I'll make a counteroffer of $1075000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to offer $1025000 for the product, which is a compromise between our previous offers.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll make a counteroffer of $1075000 again, but I'll add a condition: I'll throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 6-month warranty on the product, which is a $50000 value. So, the total value you'll get is $1125000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'm adding.
I appreciate the additional value you're offering, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to offer $1020000 for the product, considering the warranty you're providing.
